casebody.data:
The State of Ohio, Appellant, v. Weimer, Appellee.

[Cite as State v. Weimer, 143 Ohio St.3d 418, 2015-Ohio-3378.]

(No. 2014-1364 Submitted August 11, 2015 Decided August 25, 2015.) Charles E. Coulson, Lake County Prosecuting Attorney, and Karen L. Kowall and Teri R. Daniel, Assistant Prosecuting Attorneys, for appellant. Russell S. Bensing, for appellee.

{¶ 1} The judgment of the court of appeals is vacated and the case is remanded to the court of appeals to consider the evidence of an enterprise in light of State v. Beverly, 143 Ohio St.3d 258, 2015-Ohio-219, 37 N.E.3d 116.

O’Connor, C.J., and Pfeifer, O’Donnell, Kennedy, and French, JJ., concur. Lanzinger and O’Neill, JJ., dissent.
